name: Kingpaca

aura.name: king_of_muscles
aura.description: Can be ridden. While in team, Kingpaca helps carry supplies, increasing the player's max carrying capacity.

description:
Melpaca serve this Pal.
Contests between Kingpaca offer up their vassals as a wager. Those seen alone are losers of such contests.

skills.name: sand_blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: power_shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: power_bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: kingly_slam
skills.description: Kingpaca's exclusive skill. Leaps high into the air before smashing into an enemy with its massive body.

skills.name: tri-lightning
skills.description: Generates lightning that strikes an enemy three times from above.

skills.name: rock_lance
skills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.

skills.name: pal_blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
